text.p: Headlines from major national newspapers. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Prosecutor asks for 10 year jail sentence for coolonel Juan Alberto Perote
- Former prime minister Felipe Gonzalez forms permanent electoral department
- United Left launches offensive against Prime Minister Jose Maria Aznar over secret service papers
- Spain moves closer to Maastricht - sharp fall in deficit
- Exodus from Grozny and mystery over Boris Yeltsin's health
- The state got rich in July
- Laboratories protect themselves from cut in health spending
- Norwegian firm Anfi invests nine billion pesetas in two tourist centres in Canary Islands
